home.heroSubtitle: Engage in strategic card battles and outwit your opponents.

rules.title: How to Play Coup
rules.description: Coup is a game of bluffing, deduction, and manipulation. Each player vies for power by taking actions, challenging opponents, and outmaneuvering rivals to eliminate their influences and emerge victorious.

gameSetup.title: Game Setup
gameSetup.content:
Players: 2-6
Starting Resources: Each player starts with 2 coins and 2 random character cards.

gameplay.title: Gameplay
gameplay.content: On your turn, choose one action to perform. Actions can be either general actions or role-specific actions. Other players may challenge or block your actions based on their roles.

eliminatingPlayer.title: Eliminating a Player
eliminatingPlayer.content: A player is eliminated when they lose all their influence (character cards). Eliminated players reveal their remaining cards and return all coins to the Treasury.

challengesAndBlocks.title: Challenges and Blocks
challengesAndBlocks.content: Any action can be challenged. If a challenge is successful, the action is blocked; otherwise, the challenger loses influence.

winningTheGame.title: Winning the Game
winningTheGame.content: The last remaining player with at least 1 influence wins the game.
